name: ST. MARGARET MEMORIAL HOSPITAL, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW (Allen W. Staley, Sr.), Appellee
name_abbreviation: St. Margaret Memorial Hospital v. Pennsylvania Unemployment Compensation Board of Review

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and STOUT, JJ.
parties: ST. MARGARET MEMORIAL HOSPITAL, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW (Allen W. Staley, Sr.), Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
This appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Peter J. Ennis, Laura A. Candris, John C. Artz, Eckert Seamans Cherin & Mellott, Pittsburgh for appellant.
Clifford B. Blaze, Deputy Chief Counsel, Gary Kelley, Asst. Counsel, Unemployment Compensation Board of Review, Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
552 A.2d 666
ST. MARGARET MEMORIAL HOSPITAL, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW (Allen W. Staley, Sr.), Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 28, 1988.
Decided Jan. 23, 1989.
Peter J. Ennis, Laura A. Candris, John C. Artz, Eckert Seamans Cherin & Mellott, Pittsburgh for appellant.
Clifford B. Blaze, Deputy Chief Counsel, Gary Kelley, Asst. Counsel, Unemployment Compensation Board of Review, Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and STOUT, JJ.
